file_insights.changes_made: Added hover and focus animations with visual feedback
key_modifications: Imported animations and transitions from theme tokens
Added transform translateY effect on hover (-1px) and focus (-2px)
Added box-shadow on focus state with theme-aware colors
Updated border styling with increased width on focus
Added transition properties to input label and input base
Added disabled state styling with opacity reduction
Used theme tokens for animation timing instead of hardcoded values

patterns_discovered.description: Component leverages centralized theme tokens (animations.duration.normal, animations.easing.standard, transitions.fast) instead of hardcoded values for consistency
patterns_discovered.relevance: Enables maintainability and theme-wide animation consistency

patterns_discovered.description: Shadow color adapts based on theme.palette.mode (light vs dark) with appropriate opacity levels
patterns_discovered.relevance: Ensures animations and visual feedback work across light and dark themes

patterns_discovered.description: Hover animation excludes disabled state using ':not(.Mui-disabled)' selector
patterns_discovered.relevance: Prevents misleading visual feedback on non-interactive elements

patterns_discovered.description: Multiple layers of visual feedback: hover (1px lift), focus (2px lift + shadow), with varying border widths
patterns_discovered.relevance: Creates clear visual hierarchy and feedback for user interactions

gotchas_discovered.description: Using transform: translateY() instead of marginTop/position changes prevents layout shifts during animation
gotchas_discovered.impact: High - Ensures smooth animations without reflow/repaint performance issues

gotchas_discovered.description: Border width increase from 1 to 1.5 on hover and 2 on focus - must account for this in layout to prevent content shift
gotchas_discovered.impact: Medium - Could cause text reflow if not handled with proper styling
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Using transform combined with consistent padding/sizing

gotchas_discovered.description: Without ':not(.Mui-disabled)' on hover, disabled inputs would appear interactive
gotchas_discovered.impact: Medium - UX issue with unclear disabled state affordance

gotchas_discovered.description: Shadow color calculation requires theme mode detection with different opacity values
gotchas_discovered.impact: Low - Complexity in color calculation but necessary for theme support

approach_outcome.completion_details: Successfully implemented comprehensive hover and focus animations for TextField component
key_achievements: Integrated animations with existing theme token system
Created layered visual feedback system (hover and focus states)
Added theme-aware styling for light/dark modes
approach_outcome.time_efficiency: Completed in single attempt with no revisions needed
approach_outcome.code_quality: High - leverages design patterns, theme system, and CSS best practices

recommendations.recommendation: Add transition delay on label focus color change
recommendations.rationale: Label color transition could be slightly delayed (50ms) relative to input focus to create subtle sequential animation effect
Add @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) query to respect accessibility preferences
Add comment explaining the rationale for different translateY values (hover: -1px, focus: -2px)

recommendations.recommendation: Test animation performance on low-end devices
recommendations.rationale: Ensure multiple simultaneous animations (transform, box-shadow, border-color) don't impact performance
Add explicit :focus-visible styling for keyboard navigation users to ensure clear focus indicators
